titles: The praise of musicke wherein besides the antiquitie, dignitie, delectation, & vse thereof in ciuill matters, is also declared the sober and lawfull vse of the same in the congregation and church of God.
author: Case, John, d. 1600, attributed name.
publisher: By Ioseph Barnes printer to the Vniuersitie,
notes: Sometimes attributed to John Case, possibly by confusion with his "Apologia musices".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Music in churches --  Early works to 1800.
